attention2.ptxt: Never disassemble turbocharger assembly. Disassembly will spoil its original function. If faulty condition is found, replace it with new one.

s1.ptxt: Remove engine assembly referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation .
Remove thermostat assembly referring to Thermostat Assembly Removal and Installation .
Remove catalytic converter referring to Exhaust System Components .
Disconnect turbocharger outlet hose (1) from turbochanger (10).
Disconnect turbocharger water inlet hose (2) and outlet hose (3).
Remove exhaust manifold heat shield (4) from exhaust manifold.
Remove oil return pipe No.1 (5) and No.2 (6).
Disconnect turbocharger lubrication pipe (7) and lubrication pipe stiffeners from cylinder block.
Disconnect boost pressure control actuator hose (8) from boost pressure control actuator.
Remove turbocharger stiffener (9).
Remove turbocharger (10) from exhaust manifold.
Remove turbocharger inlet pipe (5) from turbocharger.
Remove turbocharger lubrication pipe (1), turbocharger lubrication pipe union nut (2), turbocharger water inlet pipe (3) and turbochanger water outlet pipe (4) from turbocharger, if necessary.

attention2.ptxt: Before starting engine (including when performing oil level check and air bleeding process of cooling system) for the first time after installing turbocharger, be sure to lubricate turbocharger while disabling engine to start according to the following procedure. Otherwise, lack of lubrication will cause turbocharger damage.

item.ptxt: Crank engine for 20 seconds to lubricate turbocharger with engine oil.
As DTC is stored in ECM memory in Step 2), make sure to clear it.

s1.ptxt: Install turbocharger lubrication pipe union nut (1) with new copper ring, turbocharger lubrication pipe (2), turbocharger water inlet pipe (3) and turbochanger water outlet pipe (4) to turbocharger with new gasket and new clamp, if removed.

torqueitem.t-part: Turbocharger lubrication pipe union bolt (turbocharger side)
Turbocharger water inlet pipe union bolt
Turbocharger water outlet pipe union bolt

s1.ptxt: Install turbocharger (1) to exhaust manifold with new gasket.
Fit turbocharger inlet pipe (11) to turbocharger and install turbocharger stiffener (2). Tighten turbocharger stiffener bolt by hand temporarily.
Tighten turbocharger inlet pipe clamp by specified torque.
Tighten turbocharger stiffener bolt by specified torque.
Install exhaust manifold heat shield (3) to exhaust manifold.
Connect turbocharger lubrication pipe (4) and lubrication pipe stiffeners to cylinder block.

torqueitem.t-part: Turbocharger lubrication pipe union bolt (cylinder block side)

s1.ptxt: Install oil return pipe No.1 (5) and No.2 (6) with new gasket and O-ring.

torqueitem.t-part: Oil return pipe No.1 stiffener bolt

s1.ptxt: Connect boost pressure control actuator hose (7) to boost pressure control actuator.
Connect turbocharger water inlet hose (8) and outlet hose (9).
Connect turbocharger outlet hose (10) to turbocharger (1).
Install catalytic converter referring to Exhaust System Components .
Install thermostat assembly referring to Thermostat Assembly Removal and Installation .
Install engine assembly referring to Engine Assembly Removal and Installation .
